name: Soul of Steam (Fizz)
description:
Soul of Steam is a single-player 2D Action Puzzle Platformer game for Windows and is based on Steampunk, a retro-futuristic world inspired by 19th-century industrial steam-powered machinery.

Everything in Soul of Steam consumes steam, walking, jumping, shooting, etc. Running consumes more steam than walking and long-range attacks consume more steam than short-range attacks. When the player takes any damage he will lose steam. Losing all the steam means the player is dead. When completing a level the player’s steam refills fully.
